message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

This paper proposes a method for constructing linguistic descriptions of images using both vision and reasoning, specifically commonsense reasoning. The paper also mentions the use of natural language processing and lexical ontological knowledge. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), followed by cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also involves evaluations and comparisons with state-of-the-art approaches, indicating a possible fit with sub-categories cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
